name: The Planet Vesta
description:
<-=-=-=-=-> The Planet Vesta <-=-=-=-=->

Collect valuable ores!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Fight off enemies!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Advance your planet!

<-=-=-=-=-> Controls <-=-=-=-=->

WASD to move.

Left-Click to Interact.

Right-Click to shoot enemies.

<-=-=-=-=-> A Benjamin Falkenberg Game <-=-=-=-=->

Created in 48 hours for DJAM2

Made with Construct3

Graphics in Piskel

Music from opengameart.org

<-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=->
